text: Kyle Jacob Trask (born March 6, 1998) is an American football player for the Tampa Bay Buccaneers of the National Football League (NFL). He plays the quarterback position. He played college football at the University of Florida. He was selected by the Buccaneers in the second round of the 2021 NFL Draft. Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Texas Category:Tampa Bay Buccaneers players
title: Kyle Trask
